overview:
Mike is responsible for revenue at rapidly growing, NY based startup, Savored.com. Venture backed by Hearst, High Peaks and Mike Lazerow of Buddy Media, Mike is tasked with growing and managing all things revenue, including sales, account management and operations.

Mike was previously Sr. Vice President of Sales and Marketing at Yodle, where he was responsible for sales and marketing strategy as well as channel development and management for Yodle. DeLuca came to Yodle from Yahoo! where he served as Vice President of Sales for the Yahoo! HotJobs division, where he managed a team of 200 people during his four years with the company. Mike joined Yodle with more than 17 years of technology and online sales leadership experience. At Yahoo! HotJobs, DeLuca was responsible for leading Direct and Channel Sales for North America, and grew the organization’s year-over-year Search and Display media revenue exponentially under his leadership. Prior to his time at Yahoo!, DeLuca led sales teams at EMC, StorageApps and Hewlett Packard. He was part of a 5-member executive team that sold StorageApps to HP in 2001.

Mike is a graduate of Boston College with a Bachelors Degree in Communications.

relationships.title: VP of Sales and Account Management
